Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that adds wet or dry workshop (1) capabilities to the game? I did Google it, but Google searching for mods is pretty unreliable (All I found was a very outdated one). Is there a more up to date one that I missed? 

(1): Wet: Having astronauts spent fuel tanks to be habitable while they are in orbit

       Dry: Giving the fuel tanks the capability to do this while they are on the ground still, then launching them and autonomously converting them (no astronauts)

Mark One Laboratory Extensions (MOLE) has habitable parts that can be wet workshops. Currently the MOLE lab does that, and I just finished the habitat that can be converted from a fuel tank configuration. I am working on a greenhouse and a Skylab-like industrial module, both of which can be converted to fuel tanks.

Edited July 17, 2016 by Angel-125

19 hours ago, Angel-125 said:

Mark One Laboratory Extensions (MOLE) has habitable parts that can be wet workshops. Currently the MOLE lab does that, and I just finished the habitat that can be converted from a fuel tank configuration. I am working on a greenhouse and a Skylab-like industrial module, both of which can be converted to fuel tanks.

Thanks!
it's cool to hear I'm not the only one after this, since the last one I used was pre 0.24.
